Hi,

fyi: I have uploaded the Java REST client I used in an internal projec=
t. It works but I think not all REST methods are exposed. So, if you add mo=
re, feel free to send them to me (or better: fork the project and commit). =
The tests are missing, since I only made some small integration tests. When=
 I have the time I will improve and add them...

http://github.com/truemped=
/heritrix-rest-client
